mapper.select: SELECT F.USER_ID AS user_id ,F.FEED_ID AS feed_id ,F.FEED_COMMENT AS feed_comment ,U.PROFILE_PHOTO AS profile_photo ,U.NICKNAME AS nickname ,TO_CHAR(F.INPUTDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS inputdate FROM FEED_COMMENT F, USERS U WHERE F.FEED_ID = #{string} AND U.USER_ID = F.USER_ID

SELECT F.COMMENT_ID AS COMMENT_ID ,TO_CHAR(F.INPUTDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS INPUTDATE ,U.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME ,U.PROFILE_PHOTO AS PROFILE_PHOTO FROM FEED_COMMENT F, USERS U WHERE F.COMMENT_ID = ( SELECT MAX(FS.COMMENT_ID) FROM FEED_COMMENT FS ) AND U.USER_ID = #{user_id}
